mcq.statement: Which of the following are the three most common types of hepatitis?

options.a: Hepatitis A, Hepatitis B, Hepatitis C
options.b: Hepatitis D, Hepatitis E, Hepatitis F
options.c: Hepatitis G, Hepatitis H, Hepatitis I

mcq.one_liner: The three most common types of hepatitis are **hepatitis A, hepatitis B, and hepatitis C**.

suggestions.topic: List of Some Important Deficiency Diseases
